<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 4.15
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LOAN AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3.0PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PX SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	INNOVATION LOAN
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Between the undersigned
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Bpifrance Financement, a limited
	company with capital of 839,907,320 Euros whose head office is located at 27-31 Avenue du G&eacute;n&eacute;ral Leclerc, MAISONS-ALFORT CEDEX (94710), registered in the CRETEIL Trade Register under number 320&nbsp;252&nbsp;489,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	hereinafter referred to as &#147;Bpifrance Financement&#148; or &#147;the Lender&#148;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	as the first party,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	SEQUANS COMMUNICATIONS, a limited company whose head office is located at LES PORTES DE LA DEFENSE,
<FONT STYLE="WHITE-SPACE:NOWRAP">
	15-55&nbsp;BOULEVARD
</FONT>
	CHARLES DE GAULLE, COLOMBES (92700), registered in the Nanterre Trade Register under number 450&nbsp;249&nbsp;677, represented by its Chairman and Managing Director Mr Georges KARAM,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	hereinafter referred to as &#147;the Borrower&#148;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	as the
	second party,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It is hereby agreed as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Lender
	grants the Borrower a loan under the conditions defined below in the sections entitled &#147;SPECIFIC TERMS&#148; and &#147;GENERAL TERMS&#148;.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This
	financing benefits from the support of the European Union within the framework of the financial instruments of the Horizon 2020&nbsp;programme by way of the &#147;InnovFin SME Guarantee&#148; and pending the setting up of the European Strategic
	Investment Fund.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage150"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	SPECIFIC TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Borrower Reference:
</B>
	0301751800000 SEQUANS COMMUNICATIONS
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	File reference:
</B>
	DOS0020293 / 00
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Object:
</B>
	Financing of intangible expenditure associated with the industrial and commercial launching of an innovation
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Total amount of loan:
</B>
	EUR
	1,000,000.00 (ONE MILLION EUROS)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Period:
</B>
	7 years (SEVEN YEARS)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Rate:
</B>
	5.24% per year (FIVE POINT TWO FOUR per cent per year) up to the 18
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of July 2015.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Beyond that date, the rate applicable to each sum disbursed shall be equal to the ARR (average monthly rate of return on long-term government loans) of the
	month preceding the disbursement, taken as 0% (zero per cent) per year if it is negative, plus 4.32%.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Repayment:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Grace period of eight quarters followed by 20 quarterly payments in arrears comprising repayment of the capital and payment of the interest, the first being
	scheduled on the 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of December 2017 and the last on the 30
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of September 2022. In addition, during the grace period, the interest shall be
	paid on a quarterly basis in arrears.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Annual percentage rate: 6.70% per year, or a quarterly rate of 1.675%.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Type of amortization: fixed amortization (straight-line amortization)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	GUARANTEES AND SPECIFIC CLAUSES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1 &#150; The sum of
	50,000.00 Euros shall be withheld on the funds lent. This sum shall be kept by the Lender as cash collateral. In accordance with the provisions of article 2341 sub-paragraph 2 of the Civil Code, the Lender is exempted from keeping the pledged sums
	separate from those which belong to it. The Borrower&#146;s claim for reimbursement of the cash collateral shall earn interest at the value of the CNO TEC 5 index on the last working day of the month preceding the date of the first disbursement
	(rounded to two decimal places). As an indication, the CNO TEC 5 index for May 2015 is 0.17%. If the reference rate is negative, it shall be taken as 0% (zero per cent). This claim and the interest generated shall be reimbursed to the Borrower at
	the end of the agreement, in the absence of unpaid debts. The Lender may withdraw from the cash collateral any sums which have become payable under this agreement, without having to inform the Borrower of this beforehand.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2 &#150; This financing benefits from a guarantee under the Fonds National de Garantie Pr&ecirc;t pour l&#146;Innovation (National Innovation Loan Guarantee
	Fund) amounting to 30% of the outstanding credit.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3 &#150; This financing benefits from a guarantee from the under European Investment Fund (EIF)
	amounting to 50% of the outstanding credit.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4 &#150; Prior to the disbursement of the loan, subscription of Mr Georges KARAM to the group death and
	disability insurance policy taken out by the Lender with C.N.P. subject to the insurance company&#146;s acceptance. The insured amount shall be equal to 1,000,000.00&nbsp;Euros.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5 &#150; The funds of the loan shall be disbursed in a single payment and in their entirety before the
	13
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of December 2015. Beyond that date, a new agreement will be necessary.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	6 &#150; A sum of
	4,000.00 Euros shall be deducted to cover administrative costs. This sum shall be deducted from the amount of the first disbursement and shall be forfeited to the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	GENERAL TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	GENERAL TERMS ASSOCIATED WITH THE RATE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	ANNUAL
	PERCENTAGE RATE
</B>
	&#150; The Borrower certifies that it has supplied the Lender with the necessary information to determine the annual percentage rate (APR) relating to the remuneration of intermediaries. It acknowledges that it has obtained from
	the Lender all information necessary for the appraisal of the cost of the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	To answer the Borrower&#146;s information needs, the APR is specified in
	the SPECIFIC TERMS of the loan for a total disbursement made in a single payment on this date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The annual percentage rate has been calculated in
	accordance with the value of the rate on the date of signing of this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	GENERAL TERMS &#150; FIXED RATE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	INTEREST
</B>
	&#150; The applicable interest rate is defined in the SPECIFIC TERMS of the loan or the loan tranche. The Lender must receive the disbursement
	request three working days before the required date of availability. The interest shall run from the first payment made on the Borrower&#146;s behalf. It shall be calculated on the amount of the sums successively debited to the Borrower&#146;s
	account by the Lender and not reimbursed, and on the costs incurred, on the basis of a year of 360 days and months of thirty days. In the case of non-annual instalments, the interest rate applied for the agreed periodicity shall be proportional to
	the stipulated annual rate.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the reference rate is negative, it shall be taken as 0% (zero per cent).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	ADVANCE REPAYMENTS
</B>
	&#150; The repayment periods are stipulated in the interests both of the Lender and of the Borrower. Subject to one month&#146;s
	prior notice, the Borrower may repay the total amount of this loan in advance.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Any advance repayment, voluntary or not, particularly in the cases of
	liability stipulated in this agreement, will be subject to a fixed charge of which the amount shall be equal to 5% (five per cent) of the capital repaid in advance, if the advance repayment takes place during the grace period and reduced to 3%
	(three per cent) beyond this period. Acceptance of the advance repayment by the Lender is subject to the effective payment of the charge due.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	INTEREST
	FOR LATE PAYMENT
</B>
	&#150; Any sum which has become due shall immediately and automatically generate interest at the rate of the loan plus three per cent, without any formal notice being required. The same shall apply to all advances made by the
	Lender on the Borrower&#146;s behalf. This clause shall not constitute any obstacle to the payability of the debt resulting from this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	GENERAL TERMS ASSOCIATED WITH INSURANCE COVERAGE
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	DEATH AND DISABILITY INSURANCE
</B>
	&#150; Subscription to the group insurance policy or assignment of a death and disability insurance policy to be taken
	out is subject to the Insurance Company&#146;s acceptance. The loan may not be used before this acceptance is received.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	OTHER GENERAL TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	JOINT AND SEVERAL LIABILITY AGREEMENT
</B>
	&#150; If there are several Borrowers, they shall be jointly and severally liable. The heirs of any jointly liable
	partly shall be jointly liable with respect to the Lender, under the same conditions as the Borrower. Consequently, the Lender may ask any one of these persons to pay all of the sums which it would have been entitled to demand from the Borrower
	without any division of its legal action between said persons being able to be imposed on the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage152"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	ISSUING OF FUNDS
</B>
	&#150; The funds shall be available after endorsement firstly of the SEPA direct debit
	mandate to the benefit of the Lender and of this document which constitutes notification prior to the SEPA direct debit, which the Borrower acknowledges and accepts, and secondly of all acts and formalities in accordance with the SPECIFIC and
	GENERAL TERMS of the loan. The funds shall be disbursed in single payment, in their entirety. The Lender will no longer be obliged to remit the funds of the loan if all the conditions, terms and specific clauses are not met on the date indicated in
	the SPECIFIC TERMS of the Loan or if, all these conditions being met, the funds have not been used in their entirety within the same period. The same will be the case if one of the grounds for recoverability applies and in the event of
	non-fulfilment of the Borrower&#146;s earlier commitments to the Lender.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	FULFILMENT OF THE PROGRAMME
</B>
	&#150; The Borrower undertakes to implement
	the entire programme indicated in the OBJECT section of the SPECIFIC TERMS of the loan and to supply the Lender with proof of this upon request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	SEPA
	DIRECT DEBITS
</B>
	&#150; The borrower undertakes to the maintain for the benefit of the Lender, throughout the period of the loan, the possibility of paying all sums owed by SEPA direct debit to the bank account or postal account designated on the
	mandate signed by the Borrower and supplied prior to the disbursement of the loan; the Borrower acknowledges and accepts that the first direct debit may be presented by the Lender, subject to compliance with a minimum period of 5 (five) working days
	starting from the date of signing of this act. In the event of a change in the Borrower&#146;s bank or postal account, it must inform the Lender of this at least one month before the date of the next instalment, and attach a new statement of account
	information to this request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	PLACE OF PAYMENT
</B>
	&#150; Repayment of the principal of this loan and payment of the interest and all other additional
	charges will take place at the Lender&#146;s head office. The due dates are non-contestable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	COMPENSATION
</B>
	&#150; If any sum which has become due
	is not paid on time, the Lender will be entitled, independently from any sums owed as interest for later payment, to compensation for recovery costs equal to two per cent of the unpaid amount.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If the Lender is obliged to produce documents relating to a court order or a pro-rata apportionment between creditors, to issue a summons or to conduct or
	participate in any proceedings, collective or otherwise, it will be entitled, to cover all the costs of handling of the case by its litigation department, to an indemnity calculated on the amount of the debt to be recovered and equal to two thirds
	of the rights allocated, in accordance with the scale in force on the date of the calculation, to the administrators in the event of a transfer of assets, with a minimum of EUR 765 (seven hundred and sixty-five Euros).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	ACCELERATED MATURITY
</B>
	&#150; The Lender may declare the total payability of the loan eight hours after notification by registered letter or
	extrajudicial act in one of the following cases:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1 &#150; if the funds of the loan are diverted from the stipulated object
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2 &#150; failing total and exact payment of an instalment in due time
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3 &#150; in the event of transfer or pledging as security, without the Lender&#146;s prior consent, of all or some of the stocks, shares or voting rights of
	the borrowing company or of one of its subsidiaries
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4 &#150; in the event of discontinuation of business or change of activity
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5 &#150; in the event of total or partial loss
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	6 &#150; if the
	agreement stipulates the receipt of an additional payment, in the event of it being impossible to establish a new basis for its calculation, following a change of activity, merger, demerger, dissolution, partial transfer of assets or placing of the
	business under lease management
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	7 &#150; in the event of death of any policy holder and in all cases of termination of any death insurance policy whose
	taking out or assignment was stipulated in the SPECIFIC TERMS of the Loan or in the event of non-payment of any insurance premium
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	8 &#150; in the event
	of a false declaration by the Borrower of if the Borrower&#146;s declarations referred to in the &#147;Declarations&#148; article were no longer correct on any date during the life of the agreement
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage153"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	9 &#150; in the event of non-fulfilment or violation of one of the clauses of this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The sums lent will be payable in the event of a reduction of the capital not motivated by losses, distribution of existing reserves on the day of signing of
	this agreement, withdrawal, during the period of the loan, from frozen current accounts of partners, except with the Lender&#146;s prior consent, or in the event of non-implementation of the investment programme which justified the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Liability for the loan will be applicable to any jointly liable party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The sums lent will also become payable without the Lender having to carry out any out-of-court or judicial formalities, in the event of seizure of property
	belonging to any jointly liable party, moving of business and in all cases provided for by the law.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The sums lent will also be declared to be payable in
	cases of occurrence of an important event of a legal or financial nature which has major effects on the Borrower&#146;s activity or profitability.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In the
	cases of payability set out in this article, the Lender will be entitled to an indemnity whose amount will be determined according to the method of calculation described in the ACCELERATED MATURITY section. These indemnities will be increased by 40%
	(forty per cent) in cases of diversion of the funds of the loan from the stipulated object and/or false declaration by the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	INSPECTION &#150;
	AUDIT
</B>
	&#150; The Borrower acknowledges that the European Investment Fund (&#147;the EIF&#148;), the staff of the EIF, the European Investment Bank (&#147;the EIB&#148;), the European Court of Auditors (&#147;the Court of Auditors&#148;), the
	European Commission, the staff of the European Commission (including the European Anti-Fraud Office) (OLAF)) and any other institutions or bodies of the European Union empowered to verify the use of the Guarantee within the framework of the InnovFin
	SME Guarantee and any other body duly empowered by the law to conduct audits and inspection activities (collectively, the &#147;Parties Concerned&#148;) will have the right to conduct audits and inspections and to request information on this
	agreement and its fulfilment. The Borrower undertakes to allow audits and inspection by the Parties Concerned relating to its commercial activities, its books and its registers. Given that these audits and inspection could be carried out on site,
	the Borrower authorizes the Parties Concerned to access its buildings during normal working hours.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	TRANSFER OF CLAIMS
</B>
	&#150; The claims which
	arise or which will arise under this agreement may be transferred without prior informing or consent of the Borrower:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- to the Banque de France, under
	the TRICP procedure for mobilization of private receivables eligible for Eurosystem credit operations, in accordance with the provisions of article L 211-36-1 of the Monetary and Financial Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	- to a securitization authority, in accordance with the legal and regulatory provisions in force. The transfer of the securities guaranteeing each receivable,
	including, if necessary, the benefit of the insurance, will be made automatically to said authority, in accordance with the provisions of article L 214-169 of the Monetary and Financial Code. In addition, responsibility for the recovery of the
	receivables thus transferred may be transferred according to the provisions stipulated in article L 214-172 of the Monetary and Financial Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	AUTHORIZATION OF TRANSMISSION OF INFORMATION
</B>
	&#150; The Borrower authorises the Lender to pass on to the other entities of the Bpifrance group and to
	the State, to Local Authorities, to the EIF and the EIB, to the European Commission if necessary and in general to all financial backers intervening directly or indirectly in this financing, the identification data concerning it and all information
	necessary for the follow-up, management and evaluation of the operation. As regards publications relating to loans of more than EUR 1,000,000 (one million Euros), made by the EIF, any refusal of publication shall be expressly notified in the offer
	letter, by the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA
</B>
	&#150; The personal data collected for this act is essential for the processing and
	management of the operation in question and in particular for its computer processing under the responsibility of Bpifrance Financement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It may also, by
	express agreement, be used or communicated for the same purposes to the other legal entities of the Group, its partners or third parties intervening for the performance of the services concerned.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	5/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In accordance with the provisions of law no. 78-17 of the
	6
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of January 1978 (the French Data Protection Act) and subsequent related laws, the persons whose personal data are collected have a right of access, correction, deletion and objection, for
	legitimate reasons, to the information concerning them. They may also request, free of charge, that the data concerning them not be used for purposes of prospecting, particularly of a commercial nature. These rights may be exercised by sending a
	letter to Bpifrance Financement, Direction des Syst&egrave;mes d&#146;Information, service SIAQ, at 27-31 Avenue du G&eacute;n&eacute;ral Leclerc &#150; 94710 &#150; Maisons-Alfort Cedex.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	COSTS
</B>
	&#150; The costs of the loan and all subsequent or resulting costs, particularly payments owed for changes made to the agreement or resulting
	from non-contractual services, shall be charged to the Borrower, who undertakes to pay them.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	DECLARATION
</B>
	&#150; On the date of signing of this
	loan agreement, the Borrower makes the declarations stipulated in this article (Declarations) for the benefit of the Lender:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	1 &#150; The Borrower does
	not conduct any research activities which are linked to activities which are illegal under French, European and international legislation, including the Charter of Fundamental Rights of the European Union and the European Convention on Human Rights
	and its successive protocols.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	2 &#150; The Borrower does not conduct any research activities which are linked to one or more of the following fields of
	research:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	a. Research activity aimed at human cloning for reproductive purposes;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	b. Research activity aiming to permanently modify human genetic heritage, in order to make these changes hereditary (apart from research relating to treatment
	of gonadal cancer);
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	c. Research activity aiming to create human embryos solely for purposes of stem cell procurement, including by somatic cell nuclear
	transfer;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	d. Research activity which is prohibited in all member States; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	e. Research activity which is prohibited in a member State in which the Borrower or the Lender, depending on the case, is located or operates.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	3 &#150; The Borrower is not insolvent or subject to insolvency proceedings and, in this context, has not signed any agreement with its creditors in the 5
	(five) years preceding the date of signing of this loan agreement, has not ceased operations and is not in any similar situation resulting from a procedure of the same nature which exists in the country&#146;s legislation and regulations.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	4 &#150; The Borrower has not, in the 5 (five) years preceding the date of signing of this loan agreement, been convicted under a ruling by a court in a
	member State of the European Union which is final and unappealable (i.e. a ruling against which no further appeal is possible) for any offence affecting its professional integrity and which would affect its ability to meet its obligations under the
	loan agreement; this provision also concerns persons who have powers of representation, decision-making or control over the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	5 &#150; The
	Borrower has not, in the 5 (five) years preceding the date of signing of this loan agreement, been convicted under a final and unappealable ruling for fraud, corruption, participation in a criminal organisation, money laundering or any other illegal
	activity detrimental to the financial interests of the European Union; this provision also concerns people who have persons who have powers of representation, decision-making or control over the Borrower.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	6 &#150; The Borrower does not operate any site in a jurisdiction classified as &#147;non-compliant&#148; by the Organisation for European Cooperation and
	Development (OECD) and its worldwide forum on transparency and exchange of information for tax purposes.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	7 &#150; The Borrower is not a publicly traded
	company, it being understood that the Borrower may be listed in a &#147;multilateral trading facility (MTF)&#148; as defined in article 4, paragraph 1, point 15 of directive 2004/39/EC.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	8 &#150; The Borrower is up to date in its payments to the tax and social security authorities.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	9 &#150; No significant event of a legal, financial or commercial nature which has major effects on the activity, assets or profitability of the Borrower or
	its subsidiaries which has not been brought to the Lender&#146;s attention prior to the conclusion of this agreement is in progress or, to the Borrower&#146;s knowledge, imminent or foreseeable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	10 &#150; No legal procedure, legal action, trial or administrative procedure is in progress, to the Borrower&#146;s knowledge, which might have significant
	unfavourable effects on its activity, its assets or its financial situation.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	6/8
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The declarations listed above, with the exception of declarations 4-,5-, 6- and 7-, shall be deemed to be
	reiterated on any date throughout the whole period of this loan agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	11 &#150; The Borrower certifies that it is not, to its knowledge, excluded
	from the European Investment Fund (the &#147;EIF&#148;)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If one of the declarations listed above is no longer correct on any date during the life of this
	loan agreement, the Borrower undertakes to inform the Lender of this by post immediately.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	RETENTION COMMITMENTS
</B>
	&#150; As of the date of signing
	of this loan agreement and until the 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of December 20134, the Borrower makes the commitments listed below to the Lender:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; The Borrower undertakes to draw up and update the following documents and make them available to the Parties Concerned at all times:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The Borrower undertakes to keep and to be capable of producing any document necessary for the implementation of this loan agreement, including those necessary for inspections by the Parties Concerned, for a period of 7
	(seven) years and 6&nbsp;(six) months after the date of termination of this loan agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	OTHER COMMITMENTS
</B>
	&#150; From the date
	of signing of this loan agreement and until all the sums (principal, interest, commission, costs and additional charges) owed by the Borrower to the Lender under this loan agreement have been fully paid and reimbursed, the Borrower makes the
	commitments listed below to the Lender:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; The Borrower undertakes to comply in every respect with all the laws and regulations (whether they be
	national laws and regulations or laws and regulations of the European Union) which are applicable to it whenever non-compliance with them is liable (i) to affect its capacity to fulfil its commitments under this loan agreement or (ii) to be
	detrimental to the interests of the European Investment Fund, the European Commission or the European Investment Bank in respect of the InnovFin SME Guarantee.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; The Borrower undertakes not to commit any violation of a provision of European Community law resulting from an act or omission on the part of the
	Borrower which adversely affects or would adversely affect the general budget of the European Union or budgets managed by it, either through the reduction or elimination of income from its own resources received directly on behalf of the European or
	through undue expenditure, or any fraud (including fraud affecting the financial interests of the European Union).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; The Borrower undertakes (i) to
	comply at all times with the relevant standards and the legislation in force concerning prevention of money laundering, combating of terrorism and tax fraud, and (ii) not (other than as a result of events or circumstances beyond the Borrower&#146;s
	control) to conduct operations in a jurisdiction classified as &#147;non-compliant&#148; by the Organisation for European Cooperation and Development (OECD) and its worldwide forum on transparency and exchange of information for tax purposes.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	APPLICABLE LAW
</B>
	&#150; The law applicable to this agreement is French law.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	ASSIGNMENT OF JURISDICTION
</B>
	&#150; By common agreement of the Parties, the qualified Courts of the Paris Court of Appeal will hold sole jurisdiction for
	any dispute relating to this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	7/8
</P>

<B>
	NOTIFICATIONS
</B>
	&#150; For the execution of this agreement, the notifications will be sent:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; for the Lender Bpifrance Financement, to its head office at 27-31 Avenue du G&eacute;n&eacute;ral Leclerc, MAISONS-ALFORT CEDEX (94710)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#150; for the Borrower (and the intervening parties) to their home address or head office.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	One copy drawn up for each party
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	the 14
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1&deg;) BPIFRANCE FINANCEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Limited company with board
	of directors (s.a.i.) with capital of 839,907,320.00 Euros, registered in the Cr&eacute;teil Trade Register under number 320&nbsp;252&nbsp;489, whose head office is located at

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	94710 Maisons-Alfort Cedex

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Represented by Mr
	Fr&eacute;d&eacute;ric VINCENT acting in his capacity as Ile-de-France Operations Management Director, duly authorized
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Hereinafter referred to as the
	&#147;LENDER&#148;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	as the first party,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	15-55
	BOULEVARD CHARLES DE GAULLE
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	92700 COLOMBES
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Represented by Mr Georges KARAM, acting in his capacity as Managing Director

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Hereinafter referred to as the &#147;BORROWER&#148;,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
	as the second party,
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard to decree no.
	97-682 of the 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of May 1997 relating to aid for innovation;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard to articles 60 to 64 of
	law no. 2010-1249 of the 22
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	of October 2010 on banking and financial regulation;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

	amended order no. 2005-722 of the 29
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of June 2005 relating to the Banque Publique d&#146;Investissement entailing the creation of the limited company BPI-Groupe (commercial name Bpifrance) and
	the limited company Bpifrance Financement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard to decree no. 2013-67 of the 12
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of July
	2013 approving the articles of association of the limited company Bpifrance Financement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard to notification-exempted framework scheme no.
	SA.40391 for aid to research, development and innovation, based on general block exemption regulation no. 651/2014 adopted by the European Commission on the 17
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>

	OJEU on the 26
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of June 2014;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard to the programme described in the application for
	innovation aid filed on the 1
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of March 2015 by the BORROWER under no. DC/03657783;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Having regard
	to the decision dated the 22
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	nd
</SUP>
	of June 2015;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	IT IS HEREBY AGREED AS FOLLOWS:
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The Lender grants the BORROWER a loan commercially known as an &#147;Innovation Load&#148; under the conditions defined below in the sections entitled SPECIFIC
	TERMS, SPECIFIC CLAUSES and GENERAL TERMS, the purpose of this loan being: &#147;Development of baseband semiconductors &#150; LTE Category O Release 12, for the Internet of Things.
</P>

	&nbsp;

<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="35%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:1PT; MARGIN-LEFT:2%; TEXT-INDENT:-2%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Amortization:
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
	linear in 20 quarterly instalments, of an equal amount, in arrears, payable on the 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of March, 30
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of June, 30
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of September and 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of December of each year, the first on the 30
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of June 2017 and the
	last on the 31
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	st
</SUP>
	of March 2022
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	SPECIFIC CLAUSES
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1.
</B>
	This aid is allocated on the basis of exempted framework scheme for aid to research, development and innovation no. SA 40391, based on General Block
	Exemption Regulation (GBER) no. 651/2014 adopted by the European Commission on the 17
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of June 2014 and published in the OJEU on the 26
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of
	June 2014.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	2. ADMINISTRATION COSTS:
</B>
	The BENEFICIARY shall pay Bpifrance Financement administration costs whose amount is indicated in the SPECIFIC
	TERMS (VAT-free &#150; article 261 C of the French General Tax Code). These costs will be deducted in their entirety from the disbursement of the loan and will be forfeited to Bpifrance Financement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3. ANNUAL PERCENTAGE RATE:
</B>
	The BORROWER certifies that it has supplied the LENDER with the necessary information to determine the annual percentage
	rate (APR) relating to the remuneration of intermediaries. It acknowledges that it has obtained from the LENDER all information necessary for the appraisal of the cost of the loan. To answer the BORROWER&#146;s information needs, it is specified for
	reference that on the date of this agreement the annual percentage rate would have come to 0.71&nbsp;% (nought point seven one per cent) per year, i.e. a quarterly rate of 0.18&nbsp;% (nought point one eight per cent) for a total disbursement made
	in a single payment on this date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="51%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="47%">
</TD>

</I>
</TD>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>

	Page 3/7
</I>
</TD>

<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	GENERAL TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	ISSUING OF FUNDS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The funds shall be available
	after endorsement firstly of the SEPA direct debit mandate and of this document which constitutes notification prior to the SEPA direct debit, which the BORROWER acknowledges and accepts, and secondly, if necessary, of the proof of the
	implementation of the prior conditions for the setting up of the loan. The LENDER will not be obliged to remit the funds of the loan if the disbursement has not taken place within a period of six months starting from the signing of this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The same will be the case:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if one of the grounds for recoverability listed below applies,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of non-fulfilment of the BORROWER&#146;s earlier commitments to the LENDER,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	if the LENDER considers that changes in the BORROWER&#146;s technical and financial capacity will prevent it from successfully implementing the project.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition, if external events constituting a case of force majeure call into question the economic benefits of the project concerned by the aid, or if
	fundamental changes occur in the status or the control of the BORROWER, the situation thus created will be examined by the LENDER, which may revise its decision to grant the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	IMPLEMENTATION OF THE INNOVATION PROJECT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The
	BORROWER undertakes to implement the entire project whose purpose is indicated above and to supply proof of this when requested by the LENDER. In addition, the BORROWER must inform the LENDER of any change leading to modification of the project
	initially presented and financed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	SEPA DIRECT DEBITS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER undertakes to the maintain for the LENDER, throughout the period of the loan, the possibility of paying all sums owed by SEPA direct debit to the
	bank account or postal account designated on the mandate supplied prior to the disbursement of the loan; the BORROWER acknowledges and accepts that the first direct debit may be presented by the LENDER, subject to compliance with a minimum period of
	5 (five) working days starting from the date of signing of this act. In the event of a change in the BORROWER&#146;s bank or postal account, it must inform the LENDER of this at least one month before the date of the next instalment, and attach a
	new statement of account information to this request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	PLACE OF PAYMENT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Repayment of this loan and payment of all the other additional charges will take place at the LENDER&#146;s head office. The due dates are non-contestable.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	COMPENSATION
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If any sum which has become due
	is not paid on time, the LENDER will be entitled, independently from any sums owed as penalties for late payment, to compensation for recovery costs equal to two per cent of the unpaid amount. If the LENDER is obliged to produce documents relating
	to a court order or a pro-rata apportionment between creditors, to issue a summons or to conduct or participate in any proceedings, collective or otherwise, it will be entitled, to cover all the costs of handling of the case by its litigation
	department, to an indemnity calculated on the amount of the debt to be recovered and equal to two thirds of the rights allocated, in accordance with the scale in force on the date of the calculation, to the administrators in the event of a transfer
	of assets, with a minimum of 765 Euros.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	ACCELERATED MATURITY
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	All of the sums owed in principal, penalties for late payment, costs and additional charges will become immediately payable in the event of liquidation or
	discontinuation of the operations or business of the BORROWER and in all the cases of expiry of the term stipulated by the law. The sums are also payable, if the LENDER sees fit, five days after notification to the BORROWER by registered letter with
	request for acknowledgement of receipt, without need for any judicial formality, in one of the following cases:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of non-fulfilment or violation of any one of the commitments made by the BORROWER, particularly in the event of non-payment in due time to the LENDER of a sum which has become payable
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of a change of activity of the BORROWER or sale of its business without the LENDER&#146;s prior consent
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;

</TD>

	in the event of suspension or abandonment of the financed project without prior informing of the LENDER,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of merger, demerger, dissolution or transfer of the BORROWER&#146;s company in a mutual agreement procedure or collective proceedings,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of sale, without the LENDER&#146;s prior consent, or all or some of the stocks, shares or voting rights of the borrowing company or of one of its subsidiaries,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of a BORROWER payment incident declared to the Banque de France,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of incorrect declaration of the BORROWER,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of occurrence of an important event of a legal or financial nature which has major effects on the Borrower&#146;s activity or profitability,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	in the event of assignment of the funds to uses which the LENDER considers not to be in line with the purpose of the loan after checking of the supporting documents presented by the BORROWER.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The sums thus becoming payable will lead to penalties for late payment. Liability for the loan will be applicable to any jointly liable party.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition, in the event of joint and several liability between several BORROWERS, the opening judgement of a safeguard, receivership or liquidation
	procedure pronounced against one BORROWER will automatically lead to recoverability of the sums still owed from the other BORROWER(s). The same will be the case in the event of discontinuation of business, dissolution or voluntary liquidation of one
	of the BORROWERS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	JOINT AND SEVERAL LIABILITY AGREEMENT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	If there are several BORROWERS, they shall be jointly and severally liable. Consequently, the LENDER may ask any one of these BORROWERS to pay all of the sums
	which it would have been entitled to demand from the BORROWER without any division of its legal action between said persons being able to be imposed on the Bpifrance Financement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	AUDIT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER undertakes to submit to any
	audit which might be carried out by the LENDER, or any accredited representatives, and to provide all facilities for the conducting of this audit, particularly as regards documentary and on-the-spot checks, to allow verification of the
	implementation of the innovation project concerned by this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	INFORMING OF THE WORKS COMMITTEE
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	When the aid is granted in the form of a loan or repayable advance amounting to more than &#128; 1,500,000 or in the form of a subsidy amounting to more than
	&#128; 200,000, the BORROWER undertakes to inform and consult its Works Committee in accordance with the provisions of article R 2323-7-1 of the Labour Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The information and the consultation must concern the nature, purpose, amount and conditions of payment of the aid granted.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER shall keep the following supporting documents at the disposal of Bpifrance Financement: notice of meeting of the Works Committee, information
	supplied to the Works Committee and minutes of said Works Committee meeting.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER is informed that recurrent or persistent failure to comply with
	the obligations defined above is liable to lead Bpifrance Financement to demand partial or total repayment of the loan.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	TRANSFER OF CLAIMS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The claims which arise under this agreement may be transferred to a special purpose vehicle, in accordance with the legal and regulatory
	provisions in force.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In addition, responsibility for the recovery of the receivables thus transferred may be transferred according to the provisions
	stipulated in article L 214-46 of the Monetary and Financial Code. In this case, the BORROWER will be informed of this by ordinary letter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	COSTS
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The costs of this agreement and any subsequent or resulting costs, particularly payments owed for changes made to the agreement or resulting from
	non-contractual services, shall be charged to the BORROWER, who undertakes in advance to pay them.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	DECLARATION
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER declares and certifies:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	&#149;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="TOP">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	that it is up to date in its payments to the tax and social security authorities
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	that no significant event of a legal, financial or commercial nature which has major effects on the activity, assets or profitability of the BORROWER or its subsidiaries, and which has not been brought to the
	LENDER&#146;s attention prior to the conclusion of this agreement, has occurred,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	that no legal procedure, legal action, trial or administrative procedure is in progress, to the BORROWER&#146;s knowledge, which might have significant unfavourable effects on its activity, its assets or its financial
	situation.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	AUTHORIZATION OF TRANSMISSION OF INFORMATION
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The BORROWER authorizes the LENDER to pass on to the other entities of the Bpifrance group, and to the State, to Local Authorities and in general to all
	financial backers intervening directly or indirectly in the financing of this application for aid, the information concerning the BORROWER, the aided programme and the amount of aid granted. This information will also be supplied to the European
	Commission, together with information on the intensity of the aid and the sector of activity concerned, within the framework of the annual reports which must be supplied to it. In general, the LENDER is authorized by the BORROWER to communicate to
	the European Commission all information necessary for the exercising of its control in the area of State aid.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	PENALTIES FOR LATE PAYMENT
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Any sum not paid within the contractual deadlines shall immediately and automatically lead to penalties for late payment at the rate of 3&nbsp;%
	(three per cent) per year. This clause shall not constitute any obstacle to the payability of the debt resulting from this agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
<U>
	PROTECTION OF
	PERSONAL DATA
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The personal data collected for this act is essential for the processing and management of the operation in question and in
	particular for its computer processing under the responsibility of Bpifrance Financement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	It may also, by express agreement, be used or communicated for
	the same purposes to the other legal entities of the Group, its partners or third parties intervening for the performance of the services concerned.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In
	accordance with the provisions of law no. 78-17 of the 6
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	of January 1978 (the French Data Protection Act) and subsequent related laws, the persons whose personal data are collected have a right
	of access, correction, deletion and objection, for legitimate reasons, to the information concerning them. They may also request, free of charge, that the data concerning them not be used for purposes of prospecting, particularly of a commercial
	nature.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	These rights may be exercised by sending a letter to the following address:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Bpifrance Financement
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Direction
	des Syst&egrave;mes d&#146;Information, service SIAQ
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">

</P>

</P>

	150&nbsp;000.00

<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In
	a decision taken on June&nbsp;29th, 2015, a combined general shareholders&#146; meeting (the &#147;
<B>
	CGM
</B>
	&#148;) voted in favour of the issuance a total number of
<B>
	60,000 BSA
</B>
	, at the price of 0.01 Euro per BSA, allocated as follows :
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<DIV ALIGN="RIGHT">
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="96%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TR>
<TD>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="25%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" WIDTH="2%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="71%">
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT">
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
	-
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP">
